channel.title: Basic 503 base
channel.description:
[center][b]Before you noobs decide to say omg this sucks, Read the title. It's a cleared 503 base. Don't post if your going to be a jerk but constructive critisism is allowed.[/b][/center]
[center][b]Features[/b] Logging in. Walking. Player rendering[You can see your character] Tabs [With switching] Game saving [Username, Password, Location] New HD [Updated Graphics] New locations [GE, Bounty Hunter, Godwars]
[b] Pics[/b] Player Rendering: [IMG]http://i296.photobucket.com/albums/mm195/Zapper_Nodle/5031.jpg[/img]
Tabs W/ Switching[And some other pictures]: [IMG]http://i296.photobucket.com/albums/mm195/Zapper_Nodle/5032.jpg[/img]
[b]Credits[/b] 50% to Pali for RS2E 503 and client+cache uploads. 25% to Zapper Noodle for client coding. 25% to me for player rendering and tabs.
[b]Downloads[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/C6BZ87]Server~Uppit[No client][/url] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=DOKHP2RN]Server~Megaupload [No client][/url] [url=http://uppit.com/T9225B]Client~Uppit[/url] [url=http://www.2shared.com/file/3637189/a6e9dc55/Cache.html]Client Cache~2Shared[/url] Put the cache into your C:/ drive.
Thanks to Pali for the Client and Cache downloads.
Instructions On Running: Step 1: Download it Step 2: Extract it Step 3: Run the server Step 4: Run the client Step 5: Hit login. Use any desired username or password.[/center]

item.title: Basic 503 base
item.dc:creator: @ddsowns ddsowns
item.description:
@ddsowns wrote:

kfortjr:

wow epic fail you stats dont even appear ftw work on it dont dl it than realease it lol

Are you fucked? Read the first sentence and title. Its a blank source! if you had a brain and knowledge of java that’d be the easiest thing to do. GF, epic fail to you. www.epicfail.com Don’t try that shit on me when you can’t even add the stat numbers to a blank source.

firewithin3:

It’s not like we have this… There was a 503 with lots of features released. There’s no point running this, it uses rs2e which is unstable and has tones of performance problems. Nobody develops 503s anymore, everyone does 508s now.

Notice how it’s a blank source? You know for starting fresh…Just one question, Are you mentally retarded? This is if you want to start fresh and is to lazy to remove crappy old diologue that retards like you think is intelligent. GF.

Read full topic

item.title: Basic 503 base
item.dc:creator: @Ic3dscape Ic3dscape
item.description:
@Ic3dscape wrote:

Agreed and Gj Maybe Il Try to code this[quote=“Different`, post:3, topic:250788”][quote author=firewithin3 link=topic=330844.msg2583888#msg2583888 date=1229379556]
It’s not like we have this… There was a 503 with lots of features released. There’s no point running this, it uses rs2e which is unstable and has tones of performance problems. Nobody develops 503s anymore, everyone does 508s now.
[/quote]
I’d like to congratulate you on trying to make yourself look intelligent through the internet by posting some shit about the stability of a ‘.bat’. Just because you don’t want to download a clean over-rated source, doesn’t mean everyone else thinks the same thing. I would download this and give it some pizzaz, but I’m a little busy working on a project for my good friend BAsh. In the scheme of things, you just wasted the time, energy, and brainpower to type that senseless comment. Good try, but I got a look out for those who really do have a brain.

~Daniel[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2008, 04:48:25 pm[/size][hr]kfortjr Its because its a clean source for people to start coding on retard

Read full topic

In the scheme of things, you just wasted the time, energy, and brainpower to type that senseless comment. Good try, but I got a look out for those who really do have a brain.

~Daniel[/quote]

Wow, you’re the biggest smartass I’ve ever seen in my entire life. Yet you point out trying to drag attention just because BAsh has a cup, makes you look like a decent programmer. “You wasted my time”, You chose to post it.

Read full topic
